description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Glasgow in the “Forties.” [Illustrations, with explanatory text.] ... Revised with notes and a biographical sketch by A. H. Millar" Author: SIMPSON, William - Artist Contributor: MILLAR, Alexander Hastie. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.g.8." Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003392660 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
